dt-option.name: searchPanes.i18n.clearMessage
dt-option.summary: Set the message to be displayed in the Clear button

type.description:
Setting the `-init searchPanes.i18n.clearMessage` option to a string of your choice allows the Clear All button to have custom text within it.
This property is passed through an `-api i18n()` function.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init searchPanes.i18n.clearMessage` parameter is `"Clear All"`.
dt-option.description:
As standard, SearchPanes will set the message to be displayed in the Clear button to 'Clear All'. This property allows that message to be configured.
This overrides any default value that is used in `language.searchPanes.clearMessage`.

example.title: Change message for the Clear button
